text:
Hello Everyone,
I hope this message finds you well.
I have a question concerning the Outlook extension. Specifically, I am curious about whether the add-ins from Outlook automatically log all emails/contacts into HubSpot, without the need to manually add them from the add-in button. Can anyone provide some insights or guidance on how this can be achieved?
Looking forward to your responses, and I appreciate any assistance you can provide.
Best regards,
The 'Email_dnd' is a module, so there's no need to paste the entire HTML within it. Simply create a section and use inline styles and remove unnecessary HTML

Yes i did it.
I have used inline styles, except for media queries which are necessary. This solution works well for all clients I've tested, with the exception of Gmail where I'm encountering problems.
<@U018962HD47> can you please share your module code here to check?
